00024 
00031 #define u_list_foreach(list, n, it) \
00032     for(n = u_list_first(list, &it); n; n = u_list_next(list, &it))
00033 
00042 #define u_list_iforeach(list, n, it, i) \
00043     for(i = 0, n = u_list_first(list, &it); n; n = u_list_next(list, &it), ++i)
00044
